Title Description Create event Location:AddEventContact Date: Time: End time: Open to Sponsor Contact: Please choose your event category Please choose your event category Are you bored and looking for events? \n\nThen, you\'re at the right place. \n\n Events would be matched with you according to your preferences and if you\'re interested, you could accept the event and add it to you phone\'s calendar by just swiping to the right or reject the event swiping to the left. \n\n You can update your preferences or add a new event from the side menubar. \n\n
Just Swipe And Go ;)!
